original: @ga   @#/_/gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/
analyzed: @ga   @#/_/gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ya man+ta ka sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ya man+ta ka sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
translated: In Sanskrit: Yamāntaka Sādhana🔽In Tibetan: Gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs

original: gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_dpal gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshhal🔽lo/_/sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste/_rang gi snying
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/_dpal gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste/_rang gi snying
translated: Homage to glorious Yamāntaka.🔽The practitioner should first perform the ritual ablutions and so forth, and then visualize a black YAM letter on a moon arisen from the letter A in his

original: gar a yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la yam yig nag po bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i 'od
analyzed: gar a yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la yam yig nag po bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i 'od
translated: heart.

original: zer gyis bla ma dang /_sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas yang dag par
analyzed: zer gyis bla ma dang /_sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas yang dag par
translated: The light rays from that invoke the gurus and buddhas, who are perfectly

original: mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/de nas yi yig tsham las
analyzed: mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/de nas yi yig tsham las
translated: worshipped and confessed to, and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab par
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab par
translated: Then, from the letter YAM, the practitioner should actualize emptiness and🔽also perform the consecration,

original: yang bya ste/_smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su ram yig las byung
analyzed: yang bya ste/_smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su ram yig las byung
translated: and should recall the aspiration.🔽After that, from the letter RAM,

original: ba'i nyi ma la hum yig las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba/_rang gi sa bon gyis mtshhan pa🔽rnam par bsgom par bya'o/_/de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /_rdo
analyzed: ba'i nyi ma la hum yig las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba/_rang gi sa bon gyis mtshhan pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o/_/de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /_rdo
translated: On the sun, visualize a vajra hammer arising from the syllable hūṃ, marked with your own seed syllable.

original: rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i dbus su zla ba'i🔽dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin skyes bu chen po'i mtshhan
analyzed: rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin skyes bu chen po'i mtshhan
translated: From that, visualize a vajra ground, a vajra fence, and a vajra tent.🔽In the middle of that, on a moon mandala, visualize the nature of the double vowels, marked with the thirty-two signs of a great being,

original: sum cu rtsha gnyis kyis mtshhan pa/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang dag par blta'o/_/🔽de'i steng du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rnam par dag pa de la/_da d+ha ya🔽ra la wa bzhi nyis 'gyur dang bcas pa dang /_ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed
analyzed: sum cu rtsha gnyis kyis mtshhan pa/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang dag par blta'o/_/ de'i steng du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rnam par dag pa de la/_da d+ha ya ra la wa bzhi nyis 'gyur dang bcas pa dang /_ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed
translated: the nature of wisdom.🔽Above that, on the purities of the eighty minor marks, visualize the four—da, dha, ya, and ra—with their doubles, and the complete doubles of the consonants

original: nyis 'gyur yongs su rdzogs pa las/_gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
analyzed: nyis 'gyur yongs su rdzogs pa las/_gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
translated: ka and so on, from which arises another moon mandala

original: thabs kyi ngo bo mtha' yas pa 'bar ba 'phro zhing bsam par bya'o/_/de nas de
analyzed: thabs kyi ngo bo mtha' yas pa 'bar ba 'phro zhing bsam par bya'o/_/de nas de
translated: with the nature of method, blazing with infinite light rays.🔽Then, from the syllable oṃ, visualize a white five-pronged vajra.

original: gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hum mthing ga dang /_ya
analyzed: gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hum mthing ga dang /_ya
translated: From the two completely perfected ones, a blue hūṃ on a sun maṇḍala and🔽a black rain cloud arisen from yaṃ.

original: las yang dag par byung ba'i char sprin nag po gsar pa'i kha dog can gsus pa che
analyzed: las yang dag par byung ba'i char sprin nag po gsar pa'i kha dog can gsus pa che
translated: It is the color of a new cloud, with a huge belly,

original: ba/_smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/_mche ba gtshigs pa/🔽thung zhing rgyas la ma he la bzhugs pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams
analyzed: ba/_smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/_mche ba gtshigs pa/ thung zhing rgyas la ma he la bzhugs pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams
translated: red-yellow eyebrows and beard, bared fangs,🔽short and stout, standing on a water buffalo, wearing a tiger-skin skirt,

original: pa/_ri dwags bdag po'i pags pas stod g.yogs byas pa/_shin tu
analyzed: pa/_ri dwags bdag po'i pags pas stod g.yogs byas pa/_shin tu
translated: wearing a deerskin on the upper body,

original: 'jigs par byed pa/_rang gi sku'i 'od zer gyis khro bo lnga 'phro bzhin pa sprul
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa/_rang gi sku'i 'od zer gyis khro bo lnga 'phro bzhin pa sprul
translated: very frightening, emanating five wrathful ones with the light rays of his own body,

original: nas/_gdengs ka'i rgyal pos brgyan pa/_khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo
analyzed: nas/_gdengs ka'i rgyal pos brgyan pa/_khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo
translated: adorned with the king of nāgas, holding a garland of fifty blood-dripping heads,

original: brgya'i phyed kyi phreng ba bsnams pa/_phyag drug pa g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis
analyzed: brgya'i phyed kyi phreng ba bsnams pa/_phyag drug pa g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis
translated: with six arms, the right hands holding

original: tho ba dang /_ral gri dang /_rdo rje bsnams pa/_g.yon gyi phyag gsum gyis
analyzed: tho ba dang /_ral gri dang /_rdo rje bsnams pa/_g.yon gyi phyag gsum gyis
translated: a hammer, a sword, and a vajra, and the three left hands holding🔽a skull filled with blood, a trident, and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o/_/zhal drug pa dang po khro
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o/_/zhal drug pa dang po khro
translated: The first of the six faces is wrathful,

original: zhal dang /_mthing ga dang /_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po
analyzed: zhal dang /_mthing ga dang /_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po
translated: and the others are blue, white, yellow, red,

original: dang /_nag po rnams gzhan rnams su zhal gyi rim pas so/_/zhal thams cad
analyzed: dang /_nag po rnams gzhan rnams su zhal gyi rim pas so/_/zhal thams cad
translated: and black, in that order.

original: ni zlum zhing dmar ba'i spyan gsum pa'o/_/zhabs drug pa/_zhabs gnyis
analyzed: ni zlum zhing dmar ba'i spyan gsum pa'o/_/zhabs drug pa/_zhabs gnyis
translated: All the faces have three eyes, round and red.

original: g.yon brkyang mdzad cing yang zhabs gnyis gar stabs mdzad pa/_zhabs
analyzed: g.yon brkyang mdzad cing yang zhabs gnyis gar stabs mdzad pa/_zhabs
translated: He has six legs, two of which are extended to the left,🔽two are dancing, and the other two are in the sattva posture.

original: gzhan gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung mdzad pa/_nyi ma 'bar ba'i dbus su🔽gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs🔽bzhugs shing bgegs rnams 'joms par mdzad pa/_thod pa brgyad kyis
analyzed: gzhan gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung mdzad pa/_nyi ma 'bar ba'i dbus su gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs shing bgegs rnams 'joms par mdzad pa/_thod pa brgyad kyis
translated: He sits in the midst of a blazing sun,🔽conquering obstructors.🔽He is well adorned with eight skulls

original: legs par brgyan cing shin tu 'jigs pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can no/_/de'i
analyzed: legs par brgyan cing shin tu 'jigs pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can no/_/de'i
translated: and has a garland of very frightening heads.

original: rjes la spyo dzam kham/_lo ske sam gi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_kun du bzang po zhes pa rnams mig dang /
analyzed: rjes la spyo dzam kham/_lo ske sam gi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_kun du bzang po zhes pa rnams mig dang /
translated: The following are generated from the seeds of the syllables j, ḍa, ma, la, and ka: Kṣitigarbha, Vajrapāṇi, Ākāśagarbha, Lokeśvara, Nīvaraṇaviṣkambhin, and Samantabhadra are in the eyes,

original: rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_nu ma dag dang /_lte ba zhes pa rnams
analyzed: rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_nu ma dag dang /_lte ba zhes pa rnams
translated: ears, nose, tongue, breasts, and navel.

original: kyi 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_chu skyes dang /_mda'
analyzed: kyi 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_chu skyes dang /_mda'
translated: They hold a wheel, vajra, jewel, lotus, arrow,

original: dang /_rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa
analyzed: dang /_rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa
translated: and vajra in their right hands and make the threatening gesture with their left hands.

original: rnams kyis sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/_dkar po dang /_nag po dang / ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_dkar po rnams su bzhugs
analyzed: rnams kyis sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/_dkar po dang /_nag po dang / ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_dkar po rnams su bzhugs
translated: They are white, black, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: pa/_de'i rjes su mgo bo dang /_mgrin pa dang /_snying ga ste/_sku dang gsung dang /_thugs rnams su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/
analyzed: pa/_de'i rjes su mgo bo dang /_mgrin pa dang /_snying ga ste/_sku dang gsung dang /_thugs rnams su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/
translated: Then, in the head, throat, and heart, which are the places of body, speech, and mind, are moon mandalas.

original: om ah_hu~m zhes pa las byung ba kha dog dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_nag po🔽dang /_rdo rje dang /_chu skyes dang /_rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis
analyzed: om ah_hu~m zhes pa las byung ba kha dog dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_nag po dang /_rdo rje dang /_chu skyes dang /_rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis
translated: On them are the white, red, and black letters oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ.🔽From them arise white, red, and black Vajra, Lotus, and Vajra.🔽In their right hands they make the threatening mudrā.

original: sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/_/de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
analyzed: sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/_/de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
translated: Then, with light rays from the seed syllable in the heart,

original: rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs nas ro gcig tu bsgoms te/_mi
analyzed: rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs nas ro gcig tu bsgoms te/_mi
translated: invite the awareness beings and meditate on them as one taste.

original: bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'i bdag nyid yun ring du bsgom par bya'o/_/de la
analyzed: bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'i bdag nyid yun ring du bsgom par bya'o/_/de la
translated: Meditate for a long time on the form of Akṣobhya crowning one’s head.

original: sngags ni 'di'o/_/om hrih_bi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat swa ha/_de
analyzed: sngags ni 'di'o/_/om hrih_bi kri ta na na hum hum phat phat swa ha/_de
translated: The mantra is: oṃ hrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: nas gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub
analyzed: nas gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub
translated: Then, request them to depart and rise up.

original: thabs rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: thabs rdzogs so//_//
translated: This completes the sādhana of Yamāntaka.
